B

BAC_BAD_PADDING - Static variable in exception com.nxp.id.jcopx.BACAcceleratorException
Wrong padding in decryption of the APDU command data This might be: Wrong padding indicator (0x01) in DO87 Padding does not end with 0x80 0x00*
BAC_CRYPTO_OPERATION_FAILED - Static variable in exception com.nxp.id.jcopx.BACAcceleratorException
An error occured while creating a MAC or decrypting data
BAC_DER_ENCODING_ERROR - Static variable in exception com.nxp.id.jcopx.BACAcceleratorException
An error occured in the decoding of a DER data object (wrong tag bytes, length of BER length field larger than latest ISO7816-4 specifications allow).
BAC_DO8E_MISSING - Static variable in exception com.nxp.id.jcopx.BACAcceleratorException
Mandatory secure messaging Data Object (DO8E) not found in command APDU
BAC_DO_UNEXPECTED - Static variable in exception com.nxp.id.jcopx.BACAcceleratorException
Wrong combination of INS byte and DO87/DO85 For DO87 the INS byte needs to be odd For DO85 the INS byte needs to be even
BAC_ERROR_APDU_BUFFER_OVERFLOW - Static variable in exception com.nxp.id.jcopx.BACAcceleratorException
The calculated response message length does not fit into APDU buffer
BAC_ERROR_DES_CRYPT - Static variable in exception com.nxp.id.jcopx.BACAcceleratorException
An error occured while encrypting the response message
BAC_ERROR_DES_CRYPT_TOO_MANY_BLOCKS - Static variable in exception com.nxp.id.jcopx.BACAcceleratorException
The data length for encryption or decryption using DES is too long
BAC_ERROR_DES_LOADKEY - Static variable in exception com.nxp.id.jcopx.BACAcceleratorException
An error during DES key loading occured
BAC_ERROR_DES_MAC - Static variable in exception com.nxp.id.jcopx.BACAcceleratorException
An error occured while MAC calculation of response message
BAC_ERROR_DES_MAC_TOO_MANY_BLOCKS - Static variable in exception com.nxp.id.jcopx.BACAcceleratorException
The data length to calculate MAC is too long
BAC_ERROR_DO8E_ENCODING - Static variable in exception com.nxp.id.jcopx.BACAcceleratorException
The length encoding in DO8E is not supported
BAC_ERROR_RESPONSE_APDU_OVERFLOW - Static variable in exception com.nxp.id.jcopx.BACAcceleratorException
The calculated response message length is too long for standard APDU buffer size
BAC_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_DO97 - Static variable in exception com.nxp.id.jcopx.BACAcceleratorException
The length encoding in DO97 is not supported
BAC_MAC_VERIFICATION_FAILED - Static variable in exception com.nxp.id.jcopx.BACAcceleratorException
APDU MAC verification failed
BAC_WRONG_LENGTH - Static variable in exception com.nxp.id.jcopx.BACAcceleratorException
Invalid length value of an array.
BACAccelerator - Class in com.nxp.id.jcopx
Deprecated. Interface covered now by the SACAccelerator class using the protocol type SM_3DES_CBC_CBC.
BACAcceleratorException - Exception in com.nxp.id.jcopx
Exception class used by the BACAccelerator for BAC compliant secure messaging.
boolean2Short(boolean) - Static method in class com.nxp.id.jcopx.UtilX
Checks if a booelan value was not corrupted by an attack and converts it to secure return values.
buildECPoint(byte, short) - Static method in class com.nxp.id.jcopx.ECPointBuilder
Creates uninitialized ECPoint object for arithmetic operations over finite fields GF(p).
buildKey(byte, short, boolean) - Static method in class com.nxp.id.jcopx.KeyBuilderX
Creates uninitialized cryptographic keys for signature and cipher algorithms.
